parameters.name: SavingsPlan
parameters.label: Savings Plan
parameters.query:
AzureOptimizationSavingsPlansUsageV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
| distinct SavingsPlanId_g, DisplayName_s
| order by DisplayName_s asc

content.json: Consumption data is updated once every 24 hours and is presented in the currency of your Azure consumption agreement.
If below tiles are reporting query errors, you must set up Pricesheet exports. See more details [here](https://aka.ms/AzureOptimizationEngine/commitmentssetup).

content.query:
let LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption' and MeterSubCategory_s !endswith "Windows"
| extend MeterSubCategory_s = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Linux'))
| summarize LinuxUnitPrice=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by LinuxMeterId=MeterID_g, MeterName_s, MeterSubCategory_s, MeterRegion_s, LinuxUnitOfMeasure=UnitOfMeasure_s;
let VMOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Windows'))
| extend WindowsMeterSubCategory = MeterSubCategory_s
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, 0, indexof(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, ' Linux'))
| summarize UnitPrice_s=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g, MeterName_s, NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, WindowsMeterSubCategory, MeterRegion_s, UnitOfMeasure_s
| join kind=leftouter ( LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet ) on MeterName_s, MeterRegion_s, $left.NonWindowsMeterSubcategory == $right.MeterSubCategory_s
| extend PricesheetPrice = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitPrice), LinuxUnitPrice, UnitPrice_s)
| extend PricesheetUnitOfMeasure = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitOfMeasure), LinuxUnitOfMeasure, UnitOfMeasure_s)
| extend UnitHrs = toint(substring(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 0, indexof(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 'Hour')-1))
| extend OnDemandUnitPrice = PricesheetPrice/UnitHrs
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandUnitPrice;
let OnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice = max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandUnitPrice
| union (VMOnDemandPriceSheet)
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice=min(OnDemandUnitPrice) by MeterID_g;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and PricingModel_s == 'SavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId in ({SavingsPlan:value})
| join kind=leftouter (OnDemandPriceSheet) on $left.MeterId_g == $right.MeterID_g
| extend DiscountPercent = (1 - todouble(EffectivePrice_s)/OnDemandUnitPrice) * 100
| summarize UsedSPsHourly=round(sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)/24),2), DiscountPercent=round(avg(DiscountPercent),2) by Date_s, savingsPlanId
| summarize UsedSPsHourly=round(avg(UsedSPsHourly),2), DiscountPercent=round(avg(DiscountPercent),2) by savingsPlanId
| join kind=rightouter (
    AzureOptimizationSavingsPlansUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where SavingsPlanId_g in~ ({SavingsPlan:value})
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SavingsPlanId_g
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | project savingsPlanId=SavingsPlanId_g, benefitName_s=DisplayName_s, CommitmentAmount_s, CommitmentGrain_s, CommitmentCurrencyCode_s, Term_s, Util7Days_s=round(todouble(Util7Days_s)), Util30Days_s=round(todouble(Util30Days_s))
) on savingsPlanId
| project savingsPlanId, benefitName_s, CommitmentAmount_s, UsedSPsHourly=iif(isempty(UsedSPsHourly),0.0,UsedSPsHourly), CommitmentCurrencyCode_s, CommitmentGrain_s, Term_s, Util7Days_s, Util30Days_s, DiscountPercent
content.title: Savings Plan Usage Details

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and PricingModel_s == 'SavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId == '{selectedSavingsPlan:value}'
| extend VMSize = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalInfo_s).ServiceType)
| extend ConsumedSize = iif(isnotempty(VMSize), VMSize, strcat(MeterSubCategory_s, ' ', MeterName_s))
| summarize round(sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)/24),1) by todatetime(Date_s), ConsumedSize
content.title: Avg. Savings Plan Hourly Usage by SKU (click on a line in the table at the left)

content.query:
let absoluteSPUsage = toscalar(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')
    and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}')
    and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
    and PricingModel_s == 'SavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId == '{selectedSavingsPlan:value}'
| summarize sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)));
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and PricingModel_s == 'SavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId == '{selectedSavingsPlan:value}'
| summarize UsedSPPercentage=round(sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)) / absoluteSPUsage * 100, 2) by ResourceId, SubscriptionId, ResourceLocation_s
| join kind=leftouter ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project Subscription=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g
) on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId*
| project-reorder ResourceId, ResourceLocation_s, Subscription, UsedSPPercentage
| order by ResourceId asc, UsedSPPercentage
content.title: Savings Plan Usage by Resource (click on a line in the table above)

content.query:
let absoluteSPUsage = toscalar(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')
    and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}')
    and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
    and PricingModel_s == 'SavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId == '{selectedSavingsPlan:value}'
| summarize sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)));
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and PricingModel_s == 'SavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId == '{selectedSavingsPlan:value}'
| extend Tags_s = iif(Tags_s startswith "{", Tags_s, strcat("{", Tags_s, "}"))
| extend AggregatorTag = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{Aggregator}'])
| summarize UsedSPPercentage=round(sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)) / absoluteSPUsage * 100, 2) by AggregatorTag, ResourceLocation_s, SubscriptionId
| join kind=leftouter ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project Subscription=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g
) on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId*
| project-reorder AggregatorTag, ResourceLocation_s, Subscription, UsedSPPercentage
| order by AggregatorTag asc, UsedSPPercentage
content.title: Savings Plan Usage by Tag (click on a line in the table above)

content.query:
let UsageBySavingsPlan = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and PricingModel_s == 'SavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId in ({SavingsPlan:value})
| summarize TotalSPUsage=sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)) by benefitId_s;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and PricingModel_s == 'SavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId in ({SavingsPlan:value})
| extend Tags_s = iif(Tags_s startswith "{", Tags_s, strcat("{", Tags_s, "}"))
| extend AggregatorTag = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s)['{Aggregator}'])
| join kind=inner (UsageBySavingsPlan) on benefitId_s
| summarize UsedSP=round(sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)), 2) by benefitName_s, AggregatorTag, SubscriptionId, TotalSPUsage
| join kind=leftouter ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project Subscription=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionId=SubscriptionGuid_g
) on SubscriptionId
| project-away SubscriptionId*
| extend UsedSPPercentage = UsedSP / TotalSPUsage * 100
| project benefitName_s, AggregatorTag, Subscription, UsedSPPercentage
| order by AggregatorTag asc, UsedSPPercentage

let LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption' and MeterSubCategory_s !endswith "Windows"
| extend MeterSubCategory_s = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Linux'))
| summarize LinuxUnitPrice=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by LinuxMeterId=MeterID_g, MeterName_s, MeterSubCategory_s, MeterRegion_s, LinuxUnitOfMeasure=UnitOfMeasure_s;
let VMOnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(MeterSubCategory_s, 0, indexof(MeterSubCategory_s, ' Windows'))
| extend WindowsMeterSubCategory = MeterSubCategory_s
| extend NonWindowsMeterSubcategory = substring(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, 0, indexof(NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, ' Linux'))
| summarize UnitPrice_s=max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g, MeterName_s, NonWindowsMeterSubcategory, WindowsMeterSubCategory, MeterRegion_s, UnitOfMeasure_s
| join kind=leftouter ( LinuxOnDemandPriceSheet ) on MeterName_s, MeterRegion_s, $left.NonWindowsMeterSubcategory == $right.MeterSubCategory_s
| extend PricesheetPrice = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitPrice), LinuxUnitPrice, UnitPrice_s)
| extend PricesheetUnitOfMeasure = iif(isnotempty(LinuxUnitOfMeasure), LinuxUnitOfMeasure, UnitOfMeasure_s)
| extend UnitHrs = toint(substring(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 0, indexof(PricesheetUnitOfMeasure, 'Hour')-1))
| extend OnDemandUnitPrice = PricesheetPrice/UnitHrs
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandUnitPrice;
let OnDemandPriceSheet = AzureOptimizationPricesheetV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines' and PriceType_s == 'Consumption'
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice = max(todouble(UnitPrice_s)) by MeterID_g
| distinct MeterID_g, OnDemandUnitPrice
| union (VMOnDemandPriceSheet)
| summarize OnDemandUnitPrice=min(OnDemandUnitPrice) by MeterID_g;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and PricingModel_s == 'SavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId in ({SavingsPlan:value})
| join kind=leftouter (OnDemandPriceSheet) on $left.MeterId_g == $right.MeterID_g
| extend DiscountPercent = (1 - todouble(EffectivePrice_s)/OnDemandUnitPrice) * 100
| summarize UsedSPsHourly=round(sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)/24),2), DiscountPercent=round(avg(DiscountPercent),2) by Date_s, savingsPlanId
| summarize UsedSPsHourly=round(avg(UsedSPsHourly),2), DiscountPercent=round(avg(DiscountPercent),2) by savingsPlanId
| join kind=rightouter (
    AzureOptimizationSavingsPlansUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where SavingsPlanId_g in~ ({SavingsPlan:value})
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SavingsPlanId_g
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | project savingsPlanId=SavingsPlanId_g, benefitName_s=DisplayName_s, CommitmentAmount_s, CommitmentGrain_s, CommitmentCurrencyCode_s, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s, Util7Days_s=round(todouble(Util7Days_s)), Util30Days_s=round(todouble(Util30Days_s)), ExpiryDate_t
) on savingsPlanId
| extend HoursUntilExpiry=(ExpiryDate_t-now())/1h
| extend AmountRemainingToConsume = round(todouble(CommitmentAmount_s) * HoursUntilExpiry)
| project savingsPlanId, benefitName_s, CommitmentAmount_s, UsedSPsHourly=iif(isempty(UsedSPsHourly),0.0,UsedSPsHourly), CommitmentCurrencyCode_s, CommitmentGrain_s, Term_s, AppliedScopeType_s, ExpiryDate_t, AmountRemainingToConsume, Util7Days_s, Util30Days_s, DiscountPercent, SavingsMargin=round(todouble(Util7Days_s))-100.0+DiscountPercent

AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'UnusedSavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId in ({SavingsPlan:value})
| where todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s) > 0
| extend UnusedCost = todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)
| project todatetime(Date_s), benefitName_s, UnusedCost
content.title: Cost of Unused Savings Plans over time

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'UnusedSavingsPlan'
| extend savingsPlanId = tostring(split(benefitId_s,'/')[-1])
| where savingsPlanId in ({SavingsPlan:value})
| summarize TotalUnusedCost = sum(todouble(CostInBillingCurrency_s)) by benefitName_s, savingsPlanId
| where round(TotalUnusedCost) > 0
| join kind=inner (
    AzureOptimizationSavingsPlansUsageV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
    | where SavingsPlanId_g in~ ({SavingsPlan:value})
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SavingsPlanId_g
    | where ProvisioningState_s == 'Succeeded'
    | extend UnusedQuantity = todouble(CommitmentAmount_s) - (todouble(CommitmentAmount_s) * todouble(Util7Days_s) / 100)
    | extend UnusedQuantity30d = todouble(CommitmentAmount_s) - (todouble(CommitmentAmount_s) * todouble(Util30Days_s) / 100)
    | project savingsPlanId=SavingsPlanId_g, CommitmentAmount_s, CommitmentGrain_s, CommitmentCurrencyCode_s, Term_s, Util7Days_s=round(todouble(Util7Days_s)), UnusedQuantity, Util30Days_s=round(todouble(Util30Days_s)), UnusedQuantity30d, ExpiryDate_t
) on savingsPlanId
| project-reorder benefitName_s, TotalUnusedCost
| order by TotalUnusedCost
content.title: Unused Savings Plans Details
